{{cpp/ranges/drop_view/title|size}}
{{cpp/ranges/drop_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++20|
constexpr auto size() requires ranges::sized_range&lt;V&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|
constexpr auto size() const requires ranges::sized_range&lt;const V&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

令 {{rlpsi|/#base_}} 为底层视图，{{rlpsi|/#count_}} 为存储的计数（通常为传递给构造函数的数，或若 {{c|*this}} 为默认构造则为 {{c|0}}）。等价于

{{box|
{{c/core|1=const auto s = ranges::size(}}{{rlpsi|/#base_}}{{c/core|);}}&lt;br&gt;
{{c/core|1=const auto c = static_cast&lt;decltype(s)&gt;(}}{{rlpsi|/#count_}}{{c/core|);}}&lt;br&gt;
{{c/core|return s &lt; c ? 0 : s - c;}}
}}

===返回值===
元素数。

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;array&gt;
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    constexpr std::array a{42, 43, 44};
    static_assert
    (
        std::ranges::drop_view{std::views::all(a), 0}.size() == 3 &amp;&amp;
        std::ranges::drop_view{std::views::all(a), 1}.size() == 2 &amp;&amp;
        std::ranges::drop_view{std::views::all(a), 2}.size() == 1 &amp;&amp;
        std::ranges::drop_view{std::views::all(a), 3}.size() == 0 &amp;&amp;
        std::ranges::drop_view{std::views::all(a), 4}.size() == 0
    );
}
}}
